pr_title: [icalendar] Describe download exceptions a bit more detailed.

timeline.message:
[icalendar] Describe download exceptions a bit more detailed.

Fixes #8846

Signed-off-by: Michael Wodniok <michi@noorganization.org>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
logger.warn("Download of calendar failed while execution.");
logger.warn("Download of calendar failed.");
timeline.author: cpmeister

timeline.body:
An ExecutionException is used to wrap other exceptions, so it never contains any useful message on its own.
It is better to log the cause exception instead.
Also, Is this supposed to be debug as well?
```suggestion
            logger.debug("ExecutionException message is: {}", e1.getCause().getMessage());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
An ExecutionException is used to wrap other exceptions, so it never contains any useful message on its own.
It is better to log the cause exception instead.
Also, Is this supposed to be debug as well?

Suggested change
logger.warn("ExecutionException message is: {}", e1.getMessage());
logger.debug("ExecutionException message is: {}", e1.getCause().getMessage());
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: Yes, it's better to log the cause if the Exception itself is not explanatory.  I thought, warn would also fit for this type of exception as it's quite general. But i don't have any problem to move it to debug.
replies.author: daMihe

timeline.message:
[icalendar] Apply suggestions from code review

Signed-off-by: Michael Wodniok <michi@noorganization.org>
Also-by: Connor Petty <mistercpp2000+gitsignoff@gmail.com>

Co-authored-by: Connor Petty <mistercpp2000@gmail.com>
